alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 10:02AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden, northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida and southwestern Decatur Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1045 AM EST/945 AM CST/... At 1001 AM EST/901 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Blountstown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Juniper, Douglas City, Mount Pleasant, Hardin Heights, Rosedale, Recovery, Faceville, Hardaway, Jinks, Nettle Ridge, Sycamore, Torreya State Park, Roy and River Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
